thread.title: Hope Hicks testifies before House Intel Committee

title: Hope Hicks testifies before House Intel Committee
text:
Hope Hicks testifies before House Intel Committee 8:18am EST - 01:23 
The House Intelligence Committee on Tuesday isis meeting with White House Communications Director Hope Hicks, as part of its probe into Russia’s role in the 2016 election and whether any Trump aides colluded with the Kremlin. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The House Intelligence Committee on Tuesday isis meeting with White House Communications Director Hope Hicks, as part of its probe into Russia’s role in the 2016 election and whether any Trump aides colluded with the Kremlin.
